name: Cat Rush
description:
Can you run fast enough? Can you fly high enough? Keep smashing that keyboard, to find out! Break all the vases on your way, eat all the fish, and above all, be a cat!

This is the first 1 hour (oh well, more like two hour) jam game, made by two very crazy people studying game design. All artwork and code is ours, music came from open sources. Cheers!

Credits:
- Joakim Isaksson
- Athina Giokarini
